按钮

保存/保存草稿一类安妮显示在右边，取消等不常用的按钮放在左边

普通状态： 禁用状态：
图标+文字：
展开代码 普通状态： <button type="button" class="btn btn-confirm">按钮一</button> <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary">按钮二</button> <button type="button" class="btn btn-cancel">按钮三</button> 禁用状态： <button type="button" class="btn btn-confirm" disabled="disabled">按钮一</button> <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" disabled="disabled">按钮二</button> <button type="button" class="btn btn-cancel" disabled="disabled">按钮三</button> 图标+文字： <button type="button" class="btn-edit glyphicon glyphicon-edit">编辑</button> <button type="button" class="btn-edit glyphicon glyphicon-plus-sign">添加</button> <button type="button" class="btn-edit glyphicon glyphicon-trash">删除</button> <button type="button" class="btn-edit glyphicon glyphicon-upload">上传附件</button> <button type="button" class="btn-edit glyphicon glyphicon-share">导出明细</button> <button type="button" class="btn-edit glyphicon glyphicon-user">通知客服</button>
